body: so recently i have been looking through the new jr mods list (congratz!) but to my discovery most jr mods were donors. so would i have a chance at mods or would it be based off how much i support the server?
body_tagged: so recently i have been looking through the new jr mods list (congratz!) but to my discovery most jr mods were donors. so would i have a chance at mods or would it be based off how much i support the server?
title: mods question.

replies.body: Most likely donators who want to support the server. As far as I know, you do not have to be a donor, all you have to do is write a decent application and answer the questions to the best of your ability in the interview.
replies.body_tagged: Most likely donators who want to support the server. As far as I know, you do not have to be a donor, all you have to do is write a decent application and answer the questions to the best of your ability in the interview.

replies.body: cole i know, but would i be one of the people who would not make it through?
replies.body_tagged: cole i know, but would i be one of the people who would not make it through?

replies.body: Depends how good your App is and your Interview if you made it through the Apps
replies.body_tagged: Depends how good your App is and your Interview if you made it through the Apps

replies.body: I don't think donating has anything to do with it. It's just a lot of donators spend a lot of time on the server and are more serious about being a mod than non-donators, so they spend more effort into making their application and get accepted. But yeah, pretty much all the mods are donors :P
replies.body_tagged: I don't think donating has anything to do with it. It's just a lot of donators spend a lot of time on the server and are more serious about being a mod than non-donators, so they spend more effort into making their application and get accepted. But yeah, pretty much all the mods are donors :P

No. This isn't a P2M server.

replies.body: Donating doesn't affect your application one bit.

replies.body: Applications are not based on whether you're a donator or not :)
